divs: Sighting DetailsI just went on their way home in the car .... when suddenly notice the plane and wanted to record it, but instead of recording a airplane...i record one ufo was a ball that had a bright glow around him ..... it was very bright, somewhat fast, and great!moved very weird .... it was something he had never seen and the video is reached alfinal hear a strange sound, a sound ..... the video captures what we can say luckily because I wanted to capture .... The plane reached a view on the bottom of the video, a flashing light was the small plane, I felt very scared the truth, because I wanted to some day have the opportunity to capture a object like this, and so it happened accidentally grabs, what scares me so much at the moment sudden,
